S06n610:2: na ca dagdha varti asatā na vinā ya dagdhā |
S06n610:3: na hi arci paścimanipāta sa varti dagdhā
S06n610:4: asatā pi paścima na dahyati dīpavarti ||1 ||
S06n610:5: 159. prathameva citta spṛśatī na ca agrabodhi-
S06n610:6: masatā na tasya spṛśatā puna śakya bhonti |
S06n610:8: asatā na tasya puna prāpaṇanāya śakyam ||2 ||
S06n610:10: so vāniruddha asato na hi tasya vṛkṣo |
S06n610:11: emeva citta prathamaṃ tu nidāna bodheḥ
S06n610:12: so vā niruddha asato na hi tasya bodhiḥ ||3 ||
S06n610:14: stattatphalaṃ na ca tadasti na cāpi nāsti |
S06n610:22: na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī |
S06n610:25: 164. evaṃ carantu na ca manyati bodhisattvo
S06n610:27: na ca trāsu bodhi bhavate na ihāsti kiṃci-
